text: What the human mind can comprehend and what it can believe, that it is able to achieve
author: Napoleon Hill, journalist and writer

text: Strive not for success, but for the values ​​that it gives
author: Albert Einstein

text: I owe my success to the fact that I never made excuses and did not accept excuses from others
author: Florence Nightingale

text: I've missed over 9000 shots in my career, lost almost 300 games
author: Michael Jordan

text: The hardest thing is to start acting, everything else depends only on persistence
author: Amelia Earhart

text: You must love life more than the meaning of life
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

text: Life is what happens to you while you make plans
author: John Lennon

text: Logic can lead you from point A to point B, and imagination can take you anywhere
author: Albert Einstein

text: In 20 years, you will be more disappointed with the things you didn't do than the things you did
author: Mark Twain

text: It is always worth starting with something that sows doubts
author: Boris Strugatsky

text: Real responsibility is only personal
author: Fazil Iskander

text: A meaningless life is not worth living
author: Socrates

text: 80% of success is to appear in the right place at the right time
author: Woody Allen

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life
author: Steve Jobs

text: Victory is not everything, everything is a constant desire to win
author: Vince Lombardi, American Football Coach

text: Science is organized knowledge, wisdom is organized life
author: Immanuel Kant

text: There is no word «impossiblein» my dictionary
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: You will never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore
author: Christopher Columbus

text: Freedom is worthless if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Either you control your day, or the day controls you
author: Jim Rohn, speaker and business coach

text: If you think you are capable of something, you are right; if you think that you will not succeed, you are also right
author: Henry Ford

text: The two most important days in your life: the day you were born and the day you understood why
author: Mark Twain

text: Start doing whatever you can do - and even what you can even dream of
author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

text: The best revenge is a huge success
author: Frank Sinatra

text: It is often said that motivation is short-lived
author: Zig Ziglar, writer, businessman and marketing consultant

text: Weak people try to be no worse than others all their lives
author: Boris Akunin

text: It's all about thoughts
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing and be nothing
author: Aristotle

text: The person you are destined to become is only the person you decide to become
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, essayist, poet and philosopher

text: Walk confidently towards the dream
author: Henry David Thoreau, writer, thinker, naturalist

text: I hope that at the end of my days, when I stand before God, I will not have a drop of talent left so that I can tell him: “I used everything you gave me”
author: Erma Bombek, writer, journalist

text: Better to be confident in a good result than hope for a great one
author: Warren Buffett

text: Some things may grab your attention, but focus better on those that grab your heart
author: Indian proverb

text: One has only to believe that you can - and you are already halfway to the goal
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Don't blame your child for being afraid of the dark
author: Plato

text: Learn to say “I don't know”, and that will already be progress
author: Moses Maimonides, Jewish philosopher and theologian

text: Start from where you are now
author: Arthur Ash, tennis player

text: When I was 5 years old, my mother always said that the main thing in life is happiness
author: John Lennon

text: Fall seven times and rise eight times
author: Japanese pogoravine

text: When one door closes, fortunately, another one immediately opens
author: Helene Keller, writer, lecturer, political activist

text: Everything has its own beauty, but not everyone can see it
author: Confucius

text: It's great that you don't have to wait a minute to start making the world a better place
author: Anne Frank

text: When I free myself from who I am, I become who I can be
author: Lao Tzu

text: Happiness is not something ready-made
author: Dalai Lama

text: If you are offered a seat in the booster, don't ask what the seat is! Just take it
author: Sheryl Sandberg, Chief Operating Officer of Facebook

text: First, define your ideal: set a goal
author: Aristotle

text: If there is no wind, grab the oars
author: Latin proverb

text: Always rely on the idea that your own decision to succeed is more important than anything else
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing optimism
author: Winston Churchill

text: They ask, «How can you get everything done in fifteen minutes?» I answer: «It's simple»
author: Richard Branson, British entrepreneur, founder of the Virgin Corporation

text: Everyone wants to change humanity, but nobody thinks about how to change themselves
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: It is important to believe that talent is given to us for a reason - and that at any cost it must be used for something
author: Marie Curie

text: If an inner voice tells you that you cannot draw - draw as much as possible, then this voice will die out
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: Determination of purpose is the starting point of all achievements
author: William Clement Stone, writer and businessman

text: We become what we think about
author: Earl Nightingale, radio host

text: I am not a victim of circumstances, I am the result of my decisions
author: Stephen Covey, Organizational Management Consultant and Trainer

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago
author: Chinese proverb

text: All children are artists
author: Pablo Picasso

text: I was amazed at how important it is to take action
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: What is money? A person is successful if he wakes up in the morning, returns to bed in the evening, and does what he likes during a break
author: Bob Dylan

text: I didn't fail the test
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Defeat is not defeat, unless you acknowledge it as such in your mind
author: Bruce Lee

text: Failure is just an opportunity to start again, but wiser
author: Henry Ford

text: I'm sure: you mustn't be allowed to be stopped by the wretched word «mustn't»
author: Richard Branson

text: Only the one who does not try anything new never makes mistakes
author: Albert Einstein

text: You become what you believe in
author: Oprah Winfrey, TV presenter

text: Happiness is not always doing what you want, but always wanting what you do
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: I'd rather die of passion than boredom
author: Vincent van Gogh

text: You learn the fastest in three cases - up to 7 years old, at trainings, and when life has driven you into a corner
author: Stephen Covey

text: People will forget what you said, they will forget what you did, but they will never forget how you made them feel
author: Maya Angelou, writer and poet

text: Our consciousness is everything
author: Buddha

text: If you want to build a ship, you don't have to call people, plan, share work, get tools
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

text: Never assume that you already know everything
author: Ivan Pavlov, physiologist

text: It's not as important how slowly you walk, but how long you walk without stopping
author: Confucius

text: If you think about what you have in life, you can always have more
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Turn your big thoughts into big actions as quickly as possible
author: Donald Trump

text: To lead people, follow them
author: Lao Tzu

text: Remember not to succeed - sometimes great luck too
author: Dalai Lama

text: Always choose the most difficult path - you will not meet any competitors on it
author: Charles de Gaulle

text: One completed productive task is worth fifty half-completed tasks
author: Malcolm Forbes

text: Our life starts to come to an end when we stop talking about really important things
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Trouble does not come alone, but good luck too
author: Romain Rolland, writer

text: Every thought is like a test, if you crumple it well, you can make everything out of it
author: Ivan Turgenev

text: Do whatever you can where you are, using whatever you have
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Remember, no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The world is divided into two classes - some believe in the incredible, others do the impossible
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The only happiness in life is a constant striving forward
author: Emile Zola

text: It is not the strongest who survives, but the most susceptible to change
author: Charles Darwin

text: You can say that you have bad genetics, poor metabolism, or you can just get your ass off the couch and start working on yourself, set a goal and believe in yourself
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

text: Never falling is not the greatest merit in life
author: Nelson Mandela

text: The question is not who will allow me, but who will be able to forbid me
author: Ayn Rand

text: When it seems that the whole world is against you, remember that the plane takes off not in the wind, but against it
author: Henry Ford

text: Life is measured not by how many years it is, but by how many years of real life there are
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Benefiting the world is the only way to be happy
author: Hans Christian Andersen

text: Either write something worthwhile or do something worth writing about
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The only way to do something really well is to love what you do
author: Steve Jobs

text: A wise person demands everything only from himself, while an insignificant person demands everything from others
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: Great are those who see that thoughts rule the world
author: Ralph Emerson

text: Before climbing the ladder of success, make sure it is leaning against the wall of the building you are looking for.
author: Stephen Covey

text: Every successful enterprise is rooted in a bold decision once made
author: Peter Drucker, American Economist
